title: hex-tech crafting reroll bullshite
body: basically i had 3 skin shards, snow-day graves, sweetheart sona and galactic renekten, i didn't have any of those champions or i didn't play them so i re-rolled them, they were all legacy skins, and i got... *sigh* FUCKING SANGUINE GAREN, I DONT EVEN PLAY GAREN LIKE WTF IS THIS its bull, make it so the more rare the skins are, the rarer the skin you get it. i legit so mad atm, thanks for reading, if you are.

replies.body:
You're asking Riot to rig the gambling machine?

The reroll is already a very negatively efficient mechanic unless you've got no Essence to unlock the Shards with or you have a bunch of cheap skins and you're feeling adventurous or something, otherwise you shouldn't use the reroll in the first place, let alone sacrificing 3 legacy skins while having high hopes for it. You were pretty much setting yourself up for massive disappointment, though the system was probably way too cruel with this reroll I agree.

Thankfully, you're in luck. Have you heard the Ocean Week? You can make up the losses with it as the rewards also include Hextech Chest and Keys.
yeah if anything you should disenchant your higher tier shards for dust and only reroll the cheapest shards.
Whenever you gamble, my friend, sometimes you lose.
you gambled and took the risk lmao
